title: OCE Servers dying..?
body:
https://youtu.be/eiYqepAIL_8
http://imgur.com/a/0FP6a

First link, a total of seven people DC'd early during one of my games, resulting in a lost 3v5.

Second link, when entering a game my teammates and I were unable to load into the game.

Other OCE players have reported similar things happening. What's happening, guys?
